name: Harsh Reality (Simon Terne)
description:
Welcome to Harsh Reality!

This is the result of the participation at my first Game Jam hosted by Epic Games.

#2021 Epic Game Jam

Team Name/Author:

Simon Terne

Gameplay Instructions:

Keyboard / Mouse; Gameinfo accessable in Main Menu

3rd Party Assets:

GameTextures.com Free Texture Pack (Landscape Textures)

HDRI by Poly Haven (Post Processing)

- Epic Marketplace Packs:

Light Foliage Pack by MYTHRA TECH (Vegetation)

FPS Weapon Bundle by Deadghost Interactive (Weapon Model)

Military Weapons Dark by Adia Entertainment (Weapon Sound/ Muzzle)
